page.title: 07THE VILLAGE HALL TATSFIELD.
page.content: The village hall accommodates most of the clubs and seasonal events that occur in the immediate area.The new born babe is taken to the Baby Clinic twice a month, the child of three attends Playgroup each weekday morning, the teenager has a weekly Club meeting, young parents relax at the P.T.A. disco and the Not So Young look forward to the Christmas Lunch.Sporting types hold Table Tennis and Badminton tournaments and the ailing can attend a Saturday morning surgery.Saturday is the day for Wedding Receptions,Jumble Sales and Bazaars.The Pond Watchers Club meet to discuss caring for the Village pond area on the Green.Twice a year the hall is brightened by the exhibits of the Horticultural Soc.and the Drama Club. Problems are solved by the Citizens Advice Bureau and votes cast here on Polling Day.
